message.content:
Subject: Notice of Departure - Leaving [Company Name] Effective [Date]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. After careful consideration, I have decided to take on a new professional opportunity that aligns with my long-term career goals. As a result, I will be leaving [Company Name] effective from [Date]. This decision was not made lightly, and I would like to express my gratitude for the support and guidance you have provided throughout my tenure here.

During my time at [Company Name], I have had the pleasure of working with an outstanding team and learning invaluable skills that will undoubtedly contribute to my future endeavors. I am proud of the accomplishments we have achieved together, and I am confident that the company will continue to thrive under your leadership.

To ensure a smooth transition and minimize any disruption to ongoing projects, I would like to offer my assistance in training my successor or providing any necessary documentation and handover materials. Please let me know how best I can support this process, and if there are any specific tasks you would like me to prioritize before my departure.

In closing, I wish the entire team at [Company Name] continued success and growth in the future. It has been a privilege working with each of you, and I will cherish the memories and experiences we have shared. Should our paths cross again in the industry, I am confident that our professional relationship will remain strong.

Once again, thank you for your understanding and support during this time. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
[Title / Position]
[Email Address]
[Phone Number]
